Uses of Class
com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ConsoleApplication

  • Packages that use ConsoleApplication 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.opendj.cli
    Classes implementing the OpenDJ CLI shared APIs.
    com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools
    Classes implementing the OpenDJ SDK client tools.
    org.forgerock.opendj.config.dsconfig
    This package contains the DS config.
    org.opends.guitools.uninstaller
    Defines the main classes that are you used by the uninstall and uninstall-gui command lines.
    org.opends.server.tools
    Contains various Directory Server tool implementations.
    org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication
    Defines the classes that are you used by the replication command lines.
    org.opends.server.tools.status
    Defines the classes that are you used by the status command line.
    org.opends.server.tools.tasks
    This package contains classes that support client tool interaction with the tasks backend.
    org.opends.server.tools.upgrade
    Defines the specific classes that are used by the upgrade tool.
    org.opends.server.util.cli
    Provides a high-level framework for implementing command-line tools.

      Validates and decodes the user-provided input.
      Constructors in com.forgerock.opendj.cli with parameters of type ConsoleApplication 
      Constructor Description
      ConnectionFactoryProvider​(ArgumentParser argumentParser, ConsoleApplication app)
      Default constructor to create a connection factory designed for use with command line tools, adding basic LDAP connection arguments to the specified parser (e.g: hostname, bindname...etc).
      ConnectionFactoryProvider​(ArgumentParser argumentParser, ConsoleApplication app, String defaultBindDN, int defaultPort, boolean alwaysSSL)
      Constructor to create a connection factory designed for use with command line tools, adding basic LDAP connection arguments to the specified parser (e.g: hostname, bindname...etc).
      MenuBuilder​(ConsoleApplication app)
      Creates a new menu.
      PromptingTrustManager​(ConsoleApplication app, String acceptedStorePath, X509TrustManager sourceTrustManager)
      Creates a prompting trust manager based on these arguments.
      PromptingTrustManager​(ConsoleApplication app, X509TrustManager sourceTrustManager)
      Creates a prompting trust manager based on these arguments.

    • Uses of ConsoleApplication in com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools

      Subclasses of ConsoleApplication in com.forgerock.opendj.ldap.tools 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AddRate
      A load generation tool that can be used to load a Directory Server with Add and Delete requests using one or more LDAP connections.
      class  AuthRate
      A load generation tool that can be used to load a Directory Server with Bind requests using one or more LDAP connections.
      class  Base64
      Tool that can be used for performing base64 encoding and decoding.
      class  LDAPCompare
      A tool that can be used to issue Compare requests to the Directory Server.
      class  LDAPDelete
      A tool that can be used to issue delete requests to the Directory Server.
      class  LDAPModify
      A tool that can be used to issue update (Add/Delete/Modify/ModifyDN) requests to the Directory Server.
      class  LDAPPasswordModify
      A tool that can be used to issue LDAP password modify extended requests to the Directory Server.
      class  LDAPSearch
      A tool that can be used to issue Search requests to the Directory Server.
      class  LDIFDiff
      This utility can be used to compare two LDIF files and report the differences in LDIF format.
      class  LDIFModify
      A tool that can be used to issue update (Add/Delete/Modify/ModifyDN) requests to a set of entries contained in an LDIF file.
      class  LDIFSearch
      This utility can be used to perform search operations against data in an LDIF file.
      class  MakeLDIF
      Program that generate LDIF content based on a template.
      class  ModRate
      A load generation tool that can be used to load a Directory Server with Modify requests using one or more LDAP connections.
      class  SearchRate
      A load generation tool that can be used to load a Directory Server with Search requests using one or more LDAP connections.

      static void ArgumentExceptionFactory.displayManagedObjectDecodingException​(ConsoleApplication app, ManagedObjectDecodingException e)
